text: Heroes' Cemetery () is the national cemetery of the Philippines. It is in Manila. The cemetery was created in 1947 as a military cemetery. The Tomb of the Unknown Soldier is in the center of the cemetery. == Other websites == * Official webpage from the Philippine Veterans Affairs Office *Romulo D. Quemado II, Corps Notes, Philippine Marine Corps (archived from the original on 2008-02-13) * (coordinates) Category:Manila Category:National cemeteries Category:Military monuments and memorials Category:Cemeteries in the Philippines Category:1947 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in the Philippines
title: Heroes' Cemetery
